summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a financial strategy related to oil purchasing. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes a disclaimer about attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email discussing financial strategies.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein regarding oil purchasing.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are engaged in a business communication regarding financial strategies.

keyFacts: The email discusses a strategy to hedge a million barrels of oil each quarter.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.
